cvm-pci.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Core Driver: PCI instruction format and core mem mapping.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum cvm_ptr_type_t

Core: The core driver routines can handle local pointers of the these types.

Enumerator:
CVM_DIRECT_DATA  Local Pointer points directly to data.
CVM_GATHER_DATA  Local Pointer points to a gather list of local pointers.
CVM_LINKED_DATA  Local pointer points to data which has links to more buffers.
CVM_NULL_DATA  If no data is sent and a flag is required, use this.

Definition at line 148 of file cvm-pci.h.

Function Documentation

static int cvm_get_first_buf_size ( cvmx_buf_ptr_t  bufptr,
int  raw 
) [inline, static]

Get the size of data in the first packet buffer in a WQE from PCI.

Parameters:
bufptr - the packet pointer from wqe (wqe->packet_ptr).
raw - flag to indicate if the PCI packet is in RAW mode.
Returns:
Returns the size of data in this packet buffer.
